thread.title: Police respond to 'active shooter' at YouTube in California

title: Police respond to 'active shooter' at YouTube in California
text:
Police respond to 'active shooter' at YouTube in California 5:24pm EDT - 00:45 
Police said on Tuesday they were responding to an ''active shooter'' at the headquarters of YouTube in San Bruno, California. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
Police said on Tuesday they were responding to an "active shooter" at the headquarters of YouTube in San Bruno, California. Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2q3aySc
